name: CYNK 3030
description:
All "Skyscrapers" functioned steadily till the moment when life support systems began to fail one of them.
Robots began to turn off supply of oxygen and to kill people. The last message which was received from a tower "by SOS! Robots went mad! They do not execute the Command of people! 2 explosions in different compartments of the building were at the moment noticed. We do not know whether we will be able to survive. Send the help!!!"
OPS (Organization of Protection of Survivors) sent the best agent cyborg at once.
Its task: It is worth learning who behind it and (to destroy) robots.
